channel.title: [c4d] ppsh-41
channel.description:
ppsh-41 Russian developed submachine gun.
This was a very difficult model for reasons i still dont know, but i had to redo the barrel 8 times before i got it to look decent. It looked to bland with pure texture so i decided to try something i have never done, and thats a scratch diffusion. I think there may be to many scratches but the gun looks like its been through alot :)
[img]http://img384.imageshack.us/img384/2387/ppsh41su8.jpg[/img]

item.title: [c4d] ppsh-41
item.dc:creator: @Freddy1990 Freddy1990
item.description:
@Freddy1990 wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:26, topic:247207”][quote author=Freddy1990 link=topic=326177.msg2572403#msg2572403 date=1228756178]
Looks great Frell, you should model a Belgian gun once! http://world.guns.ru/smg/smg13-e.htm P90 <3
[/quote]
That doesnt look too hard, ill go for it.[/quote]
Cool, you know, it’s not just any Belgian-made gun
It’s also THE Stargate gun

Yea, that’s right, we made the Stargate gun!

Read full topic

item.title: [c4d] ppsh-41
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“Archer, post:20, topic:247207”][quote author=SomethingToHide link=topic=326177.msg2559275#msg2559275 date=1228062664]

More than that. You won’t get those harsh dark shadows with an HDRI, unless it’s pure black/white.

Still, that little bit looks WAY better than some of the other stuff on here.

read: Archer’s

His R2 isn’t quite done.

Other than that, I can’t think of a single other person who posts something good here. And by that I mean even if the model is good, the scene blows ass.
[/quote]

my R2 is not even near done, but I think Frell will always beat me in scenes.[/quote]
i think i have been doing scenes a bit longer than you, my first was about 2 years ago. if you go into the search box and type [c4d] you can see every c4d post on the forums.

Read full topic

item.title: [c4d] ppsh-41
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“the bank, post:5, topic:247207”][quote author=SomethingToHide link=topic=326177.msg2556569#msg2556569 date=1227933684]

The trigger holder is perfectly round, and the barrel is a box with circles in it.
[/quote]That is how the gun is designed in the first place. If he were to do it differently, it would not be a replica.

Also, Frell, a little too much CoD5?[/quote]
I was thinking of other guns to model, and i was using the ppsh so i decided to try it.

[quote=“Cowie`, post:6, topic:247207”][quote author=the bank link=topic=326177.msg2557072#msg2557072 date=1227966643]

The trigger holder is perfectly round, and the barrel is a box with circles in it.
[/quote]That is how the gun is designed in the first place. If he were to do it differently, it would not be a replica.

Also, Frell, a little too much CoD5?

Thing is it doesn’t look like that on CoD5.[/quote]
i know

Read full topic

PS: trigger?[/quote]
the trigger is a simple shape and i really just want the body to be noticed, but just for kicks i throw in a tirgger

And what do you mean by to primitive?
